name: Boost 1.88
body:
## What's Changed
* Add ppc64le to CI and fix node version issues by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/217
* Add support for modular build structure. by @grafikrobot in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/218
* Fix float128 support when long double is not supported by @iv-m in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/222
* Add GCC 14 runs to drone by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/223
* Allow user to override quadmath linking by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/224
* Fix missing : in adhoc example by @schorsch1976 in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/225
* Use boostlook for docs rendering V2 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/228
* Replace macos-12 runners with macos-15 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/229
* Use correct 64bit full multiplication for MinGW on ARM64 by @vejbomar in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/230
* Update drone images to LTS and add 24.04 Clangs by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/231
* Simplify boostlook command by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/233
* Fixes for fixed width 128-bit float with specified precision by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/232
* Fix node 20 issue on GHA CI by @Flamefire in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/236
* Fix off-by-one error in parser buffer size by @Flamefire in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/243
* Remove superflous assignment to exponent argument in parser by @Flamefire in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/240
* GHA: Show b2 command invocation by @Flamefire in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/245
* GHA: Fix GCC 13 job by @Flamefire in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/247
* Removed a spurious dependency to Boost.Random in tests by @anarthal in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/250
* Fix uninitialized values when parsing zeroes  by @Flamefire in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/242
* Made BOOST_CHARCONV_HAS_QUADMATH a usage requirement in the Jamfile by @anarthal in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/252
* Remove superflous test duplication by @Flamefire in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/239
* Fix boost min/max guidelines violations by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/254
* Merge to master for 1.88 by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/257
* Add check for HUGE_VALQ in config step as Cray Clang does not provide it by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/259
* Merge Cray configuration bug fix to master by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/260

## New Contributors
* @grafikrobot made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/218
* @iv-m made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/222
* @schorsch1976 made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/225
* @vejbomar made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/230
* @anarthal made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/250

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/compare/boost-1.86.0...boost-1.88.0

name: Boost 1.86.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Move `__float128` to it's own cpp file by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/177
* Update CI toolchains by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/178
* Add native to_chars support for <stdfloat> 16-bit types instead of using interchange format by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/179
* Add echo DRONE_STAGE_MACHINE by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/180
* Fix potential overflow in interchange of 16-bit from chars by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/181
* GHA: Use codecov action to upload coverage by @Flamefire in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/184
* Fuzz `to_chars` for integers by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/185
* Add fuzzing to `to_chars` for floats by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/187
* Disable long double overloads on platforms with unsupported types by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/183
* Fix first character `from_chars` integer pattern matching by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/189
* Fix internal crash in `floff` by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/192
* Update method of detecting and linking quadmath by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/193
* Add mingw extern c for intrinsics by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/197
* Update GCC-13 OS by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/199
* Remove packages by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/198
* Remove and replace macos-11 runners by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/200
* Remove now unused x86 and ARM intrinsics headers by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/202
* Add check for -Woverflow in GCC testing by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/203
* Improve fixed format testing and fix 0 insertion bugs by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/206
* Fix Clang 3.6 auto type deduction by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/208
* Drone: fixing ASAN by @sdarwin in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/211
* Fix overflow detection by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/214

## New Contributors
* @Flamefire made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/184
* @sdarwin made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/211

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/compare/boost-1.85.0...boost-1.86.0

name: Boost 1.85.0
body:
## What's Changed
* fix typo in fast_float.hpp by @akrzemi1 in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/135
* Add fuzzing to CI by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/134
* Conditionally link quadmath by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/132
* Add testing and fix handling of leading spaces by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/144
* Reverse behavior of from_chars and from_chars_strict by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/141
* Collected documentation updates from review comments by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/145
* Post-Review Refactoring by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/146
* Add string_view interface to from_chars by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/147
* Fix long double and Float128 negative sign being overwritten by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/150
* Fix to_chars_hex exp for Float128 types by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/151
* Add dragonbox, floff and Junekey Jeon to sources and acknowledgements by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/155
* Add cap to output lenght of `to_chars` for `std::bfloat16_t` with interchange format by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/157
* Add additional bounds checking in `to_chars` for floats by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/153
* Fix 80-bit long double hex formatting by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/159
* Add fixed format printing to floff by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/161
* Use floff to consistently generate correctly rounded results by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/164
* Fix to_chars errc value for overflow by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/167
* Try to fix #158 by @jk-jeon in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/169
* Fix for issue #166 negative precision by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/168
* Issue 158 for 80 and 128 bit types by @mborland in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/171

## New Contributors
* @akrzemi1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/135
* @jk-jeon made their first contribution in https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/pull/169

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/boostorg/charconv/compare/v1.2.0...boost-1.85.0

name: v1.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Replace `BOOST_CHARCONV_STD_ERANGE` with `from_chars_strict` by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/120
* Documentation Updates from Review Comments by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/127
* Use improved fall back routine for 80 and 128 bit from chars by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/128
* Fix locale dependence on fallback from_chars implementation  by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/123

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/compare/v1.1.1...v1.2.0

name: v1.1.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix `from_chars` handling of non-finite 80 and 128-bit values by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/115

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.1

name: v1.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Implement P2497 from C++26 by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/98
* Fix for PPC64 long double test failure by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/102
* Fix for PPC64 errno value converting LDBL_MIN by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/104
* Fix `<stdfloat>` testing macro by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/109
* Add macro to change ERANGE handling.  by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/111

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/compare/v1.0.1...v1.1.0

name: v1.0.1
body:
## What's Changed

* Remove use of `auto` in introductory examples by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/85
* Add {fmt} to benchmarks by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/86
* Fix overflow of 128-bit integers in non-GNU mode by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/88
* Fix -Wundef warnings by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/90
* Fix conversion warnings by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/92
* Fix bfloat macros and long double general formatting by @mborland in https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/pull/94

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cppalliance/charconv/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1
